hyp: State-owned enterprises and advantageous private enterprises entered the old revolutionary base areas of southern Jiangxi.

From September 26 to 27, in order to deepen and expand the educational achievements on the theme of "Do not forget your initiative mind, keeping in mind the mission", the Central integration of defense and civilian technologies Office, the State Administration of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense and the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce jointly organized a research activity on "State-owned enterprises and advantageous private enterprises entering the old revolutionary base areas in southern Gannan" to review the history of the revolution, pursue the red footprint, inherit the red gene, carry out the docking of relevant enterprises with the needs of Ganzhou City, and promote the accelerated development of the old revolutionary base areas

Jin Zhuanglong, Executive Deputy Director of the Central Military-Civil Integration Office, Xu Lejiang, Vice Minister of the Central United Front Work Department, Secretary of the Party Group and Executive Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, Zhang Kejian, Director of the State Bureau of Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense, and Li Bingjun, Deputy Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee and Secretary of the Ganzhou Municipal Party Committee participated in the investigation.

The enterprises participating in the research activities include 8 military industrial group companies such as China Aerospace Science and Technology Group Co., Ltd., 10 Minkou state-owned enterprises such as Hunan Rare Earth Metal Materials Research Institute, and 15 advantageous private enterprises such as Yanxiang Group.

In the meantime, the researchers visited the Memorial Park of the origin of the Central Red Army's Long March, remembered the revolutionary martyrs, received revolutionary traditional education, reviewed the difficult course of the Red Army's Long March period, investigated seven enterprises and one testing center in Ganzhou City on the spot, held a special symposium, reached eight cooperation projects and signed contracts on the spot.
